entities.description: Identifies the relationship between the victim and the offender.
Number of offenders involved in the reported case.
The frequency of cases unweighted, i.e., actual number of cases reported.
Total number of cases considered in the dataset.
Instances of missing or unreported data in the survey.

relationships.description: Links survey responses to the relationship between the victim and offender.
Links survey responses to the number of offenders involved.
Connects survey statistical analysis to the actual number of unweighted frequencies.
Links the survey to the total number of cases considered.
Indicates the amount of missing data in the survey.
